test-method.name: test_CreateMessage
test-method.description: As a User I can create a message(it's stored in Drafts automatically)

test-method.name: test_SendMessage
test-method.description: As a User I can send a message (it's stored in Sent automatically)

test-method.name: test_OpenInboxMessage
test-method.description: As a User I can open inbox message from list

test-method.name: test_ReplyToMessage
test-method.description: As a User I can reply to inbox message

test-method.name: test_ForwardInboxMessage
test-method.description: As a User I can forward inbox message

test-method.name: test_Read_And_Move_ToTrash
test-method.description: As a User I can move opened Inbox message to Trash immediately)

test-method.name: test_Move_FromInboxList_ToTrash
test-method.description: As a User I can move a message to Trash from Inbox-list

test-method.name: test_Recover_FromTrashList_ToInbox
test-method.description: As a User I can recover message from Trash back to Inbox

test-method.name: test_Move_FromInboxList_ToSpam
test-method.description: As a User I can move a message to Spam directly from Inbox

test-method.name: test_Recover_FromSpamList_ToInbox
test-method.description: As a User I can recover message from Spam folder (back to Inbox)

test-method.name: test_DragAndDrop_InboxToSpam
test-method.description: As a User I can drag-n-drop selected message from Inbox to Spam folder)

test-method.name: test_Login
test-method.description: As a User I can login only with valid credentials

test-method.name: test_Login
test-method.description: As a User I can login only with valid credentials

param.value: Неверно указан логин или пароль. Подробнее

test-method.name: test_Login
test-method.description: As a User I can login only with valid credentials

param.value: Неверно указан логин или пароль. Подробнее

test-method.name: testCheckRegistrationLinks
test-method.description: Checking registration links on the login page

test-method.name: testRegPageEmptyFieldsErrorHandling
test-method.description: Checking error messages on the Registration page - 'Empty fields'
